title: curse your lips
description: After the most intense, sensual dream of her life, Astrid lives an incredible supernatural occurrence that turns her whole life upside down. The very hero of her dream, a half man-half deity descends into her real life and allures her into a mind-blowing game of carnal, lascivious seduction. Can Astrid handle the game, or is she ready to surrender?
author: Imogen Karo
